newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0805 CDT.
LIVE CATTLE - Up 0.150 to of 0.150 cent. Carryover technical strength possible but may slip with cash markets.
FEEDER CATTLE - Steady to up 0.200 cent. Index at new high for the move and corn futures again look weak.
LEAN HOGS - Steady to off 0.200 cent. Lower cash hog prices on increased runs but pork cutout values up.
PORK BELLIES - Up 0.300 to off 0.200 cent. Old crop seen up on firm cash while new crop down on hog report estimates.
